system.description:
You know how to lead, and you know how to stay out of sight. That combination makes you a force multiplier for your allies and a threat in your own right. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When you would learn a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.o2eh10mg3xh9tbu3]{Skill Trick} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.n6ss7hf32xkiqxqx]{Lesson of War}, you can choose freely from either list.
  • Half your rogue levels count as marshal levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.glbhnd16q6qmysjh]{Extra Attack} feature.
  • You gain proficiency with the Stealth skill or an expertise die if you are already proficient.
  • When allied creatures inside the range of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.d71mc2057x7y6c08]{Commanding Presence} make a Stealth check, they can use your bonus instead of their own if it is higher.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in marshal, 3 levels in rogue
